title: Leavebuster because of client repair

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
https://gyazo.com/d73a80099ef2a02f9109c2984a7475e1

I was starting a game after the client update and my client crashed and made me repair stuff. The game still started and i couldn't join. Now i have to wait 20 min for 5 games before starting a game -,.-. 
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} 

This is what i read here: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-support/W0aEONuP-2017-ranked-rewards-help-desk
DISQUALIFICATION
As announced in August, certain players are ineligible for this seasonâ€™s rewards:

Players with bans or chat restrictions active when the season ends.
Players issued a ban of 7 days or more after Aug 22nd, 23:59 Pacific Time.
Players banned for boosting during the 2017 season.
Players who experience fraud-related or erroneous bans will still be eligible. Players hit with LeaverBuster will also be eligible.

What now??

replies.body:
Hey there, don't worry!  To clarify here, you are still eligible if you get a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).  You will get your rewards if you haven't had behavioral incidents.

It does suck to see this crash though.  :(  Was the repair able to get this fixed up?  Be sure to test in a custom game first!
